name: Loco Road
description:
The last shall be first... to die!!!

Loco Road is a crazy game about races and explosions in which you must avoid at all cost the last spot, as, each lap, the last rider will blow up mercilessly. Test out your driving skills, fight other locoriders with an arsenal of weapons and get to the top of the foodchain in this mayhem of wheels and bullets!!

With 7 maps and 3 extra game modes we hope you enjoy our free game as much as we enjoyed making it!

May the Loco Road gods be with you!
